download.title: Download
download.subtitle: Claim your throne as the King of Knowledge. Free for personal use, no account required.
download.requirements: Supports Claude, Gemini, Codex, LM Studio & Ollama.

blog.title: Latest from the
blog.emptyDescription: We're working on some great content. Check back soon for tutorials, guides, and best practices.

showcase.title: Powerful Interface,
showcase.subtitle: Every feature designed to help you orchestrate AI agents efficiently

kanban.title: Agent Kanban Dashboard
kanban.description: Track all your agent tasks with a powerful drag-and-drop Kanban board. Organize by status, priority, and agent assignments.

flowEditor.title: Visual Flow Editor
flowEditor.description: Design complex multi-agent workflows with our node-based editor. Chain agents, add conditions, and run parallel tasks.

execution.title: Real-Time Flow Execution
execution.description: Watch your workflows execute in real-time. See each node light up as agents process, track progress, and monitor results as they complete.

config.title: Agent Configuration
config.description: Create specialized agents with custom prompts, tool permissions, and MCP configurations tailored to specific tasks.

chat.title: Multi-Session Chat
chat.description: Run multiple conversations in parallel, fork any session, and link discussions directly to tickets for tracking.

worktree.title: Git Worktree Management
worktree.description: Manage multiple git worktrees seamlessly. Work on different branches simultaneously without switching contexts.

agentic.title: Agentic File Review
agentic.description: Review every file change made by your agents with a detailed diff viewer. Accept, reject, or modify changes before they reach your codebase.

howItWorks.title: How
howItWorks.subtitle: From agent creation to workflow automation in three simple steps. No coding required. Just drag, drop, and orchestrate.

createAgents.title: Create Specialized Agents
createAgents.description: Define AI agents with specific prompts, tool permissions, and MCP configurations. Create a Paper Fetcher, a Hypothesis Generator, an Experiment Runner: each optimized for its role.

designWorkflow.title: Design Your Workflow
designWorkflow.description: Use the visual flow editor to chain agents together. Add conditional branches, parallel execution, and data transformation nodes to build sophisticated pipelines.

trackTickets.title: Track Everything with Tickets
trackTickets.description: As agents work, their outputs link to tickets automatically. View the Kanban board to see progress, drill into any ticket for full conversation history and agent execution logs.

cta.badge: Ready to rule your knowledge domain?
cta.title: Claim Your Throne as
cta.subtitle: Download Sciorex and command your AI agent army. Free for personal use, no account required.
